text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Grands-Ponts Region | native_name = Région des Grands-Ponts | native_name_lang = fr | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map =File:Grands-Ponts region locator map Côte d'Ivoire.jpg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Grands-Ponts Region (green) in Ivory Coast and in Lagunes District | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = District |subdivision_name1 = Lagunes |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 2011 | founder = | seat_type =Regional seat | seat =Dabou | government_footnotes = "Préfets de Région et de Préfets de Département (Conseil des ministres du mercredi 26 septembre 2012)", abidjan.net, 2 October 2012. | leader_title = Prefect | leader_name = Kouakou Assoman | leader_title1 = Council President | leader_name1 = Joseph Gabriel Yace | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes ="Découverte des Grands Ponts", ardci-rd.org, accessed 23 February 2016. | area_total_km2 = 4430 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes =Citypopulation.de Population of regions and departments of Ivory Coast | population_total = 450007 | population_as_of = 2021 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = GMT | utc_offset1 = +0 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Grands-Ponts Region is one of the 31 regions of Ivory Coast. Since 2011, it has been one of three regions in Lagunes District. The capital of the region is Dabou. As of the 2021 census, 450,007 people lived there. Grands-Ponts Region is divided into three departments: Dabou, Grand-Lahou and Jacqueville. == References == Category:2011 establishments in Africa Category:Regions of Africa Category:Geography of Ivory Coast
title: Grands-Ponts Region
